task.summary: Default task
Initialise the Live-Streaming backend project.
Initialise the Live-Streaming backend project.

1. Implement skeleton code for User Module. 2. Finilised Bussiness Logic: User Controller -> User RPC -> User Service -> Dao Layer(Mybatis Plus Mapper + Persistent Object) -> ShardingJDBC Logic Table Query -> MySQL

1. Setup RedisTemplate Config class, Make sure the key and value can be serialised by Jackson into Specific Class. 2. Setup Redis Key Builder to make sure the format of redis key is distinct from each module. 3. Integrate the usage of Redis for caching.
1. Integrate with RocketMQ. 2. Set up Configuration for both RocketMQ consumer and provider. 3. Utilise RocketMQ to achieve Delayed Second Deletion for Final Consistency between MySQL and Redis.
Implement Distributed ID Generator to ensure consistency between distributed machines.

1. Implement CRUD for User Tag Business. 1.1 Set or Update User Tag. If update successfully, apply double delayed deletion of keys in Redis. 1.2 Double delayed deletion to Cancelled tags in both redis and mysql. 1.3 When users check if they have the tags, redis will cache the results if they have one.
Build Docker Image for User module.
Self-implemented ShardingJDBC driver to avoid invalid driver that unsupported to load nacos url

1. Integrate with Gateway API to filter requests that is not for login. 2. Implement entire login module: 2.1 Integrate with SMS message provider microservice. 2.2 Implement Token Generation for User ID 2.3 Implement Registration with User ID.

Finished Implementation of Entire IM server: 1. User can get list of live stream rooms. 1.1 The current live stream room records are fetched from db and updated every 1 second to redis. 1.2 Redis locks are applied to avoid different JVM processes update the database in the same time. 1.3 User can get rooms with page number and page size in redis. 2. Users can send broadcast message to other users in the same room. 2.1 Generate IM token and bind user id with the related socket channel. 2.2 Implement core im-server architecture and the idea will be shown in the diagram. 2.3 Rewrited Cluster and Invoker with Dubbo SPI for the router module to send processed message back to specific server that connects to the receiver. 2.4 Implement a mechanism to decide whether needs to resend the processed message to the user. 2.5 Implement Heartbeat mechanisms to ensure users are alive.
Finalise Optimisation and Wording of User-Provider Module.
Finalise Optimisation of Stream Room and IM server Module.
Added Global Error Handler for Controller Layer + Prepare Load Limiter.
1. Reformat Live Stream Room Module and IM Core Server Module. 2. Put Related Modules into Docker Container.
1. Finished Modules For User to Buy Virtual Coin and Send Gift.
Finalised Wording of Gift and User Payment Module.
Replaced payment-callback module with a Dubbo RPC provider in live-user-payment module so that the change in deployment address of payment callback can be determined by Dubbo immediately.
Reformat Wording of Rpc to RPC.
Finalised Implementation of PK Live Stream Room.
Finalised Implementation of Red Packet Rain Event.
Finalised Implementation for flash sale of SKU products.
Finalised Frontend Code and Finalise This Project.

MESSAGE.value: Initialise the Live-Streaming backend project.

1. Implement skeleton code for User Module. 2. Finilised Bussiness Logic: User Controller -> User RPC -> User Service -> Dao Layer(Mybatis Plus Mapper + Persistent Object) -> ShardingJDBC Logic Table Query -> MySQL

1. Setup RedisTemplate Config class, Make sure the key and value can be serialised by Jackson into Specific Class. 2. Setup Redis Key Builder to make sure the format of redis key is distinct from each module. 3. Integrate the usage of Redis for caching.
1. Integrate with RocketMQ. 2. Set up Configuration for both RocketMQ consumer and provider. 3. Utilise RocketMQ to achieve Delayed Second Deletion for Final Consistency between MySQL and Redis.
Implement Distributed ID Generator to ensure consistency between distributed machines.

1. Implement CRUD for User Tag Business. 1.1 Set or Update User Tag. If update successfully, apply double delayed deletion of keys in Redis. 1.2 Double delayed deletion to Cancelled tags in both redis and mysql. 1.3 When users check if they have the tags, redis will cache the results if they have one.
Build Docker Image for User module.
Self-implemented ShardingJDBC driver to avoid invalid driver that unsupported to load nacos url

1. Integrate with Gateway API to filter requests that is not for login. 2. Implement entire login module: 2.1 Integrate with SMS message provider microservice. 2.2 Implement Token Generation for User ID 2.3 Implement Registration with User ID.

1. Implement entire login module: 1.1 Integrate with SMS message provider microservice (with test mode) to send and check login code. 1.2 Implement Token Generation for User ID. 1.3 Implement Registration with User Phone. The phone number is encrypted. 1.4 Implement a upstream controller layer microservice api which checks code provided by users, 1.5 Integrate with Gateway API to filter requests that is not for login, and check validation of token in the cookie + convert it to user id in header of HTTP requests to other modules. 1.6 Implement a startup configuration that checks HTTP headers and puts user id inside ThreadLocal variables for each module, so user id can be used within the local thread.

Finished Implementation of Entire IM server: 1. User can get list of live stream rooms. 1.1 The current live stream room records are fetched from db and updated every 1 second to redis. 1.2 Redis locks are applied to avoid different JVM processes update the database in the same time. 1.3 User can get rooms with page number and page size in redis. 2. Users can send broadcast message to other users in the same room. 2.1 Generate IM token and bind user id with the related socket channel. 2.2 Implement core im-server architecture and the idea will be shown in the diagram. 2.3 Rewrited Cluster and Invoker with Dubbo SPI for the router module to send processed message back to specific server that connects to the receiver. 2.4 Implement a mechanism to decide whether needs to resend the processed message to the user. 2.5 Implement Heartbeat mechanisms to ensure users are alive.
Finalise Optimisation and Wording of User-Provider Module.
Finalise Optimisation of Stream Room and IM server Module.
Added Global Error Handler for Controller Layer + Prepare Load Limiter.
1. Reformat Live Stream Room Module and IM Core Server Module. 2. Put Related Modules into Docker Container.
1. Finished Modules For User to Buy Virtual Coin and Send Gift.
Finalised Wording of Gift and User Payment Module.
Replaced payment-callback module with a Dubbo RPC provider in live-user-payment module so that the change in deployment address of payment callback can be determined by Dubbo immediately.
Reformat Wording of Rpc to RPC.
Finalised Implementation of PK Live Stream Room.
Finalised Implementation of Red Packet Rain Event.
Finalised Implementation for flash sale of SKU products.
Finalised Frontend Code.
Finalised Frontend Code and Finalise This Project.
